reviews.review: Просто шедевр

这是我遇到的唯一一个对steam自带的手柄配置兼容有bug的游戏，明明各种第三方游戏甚至启动非steam游戏都没问题，没想到v社自己的游戏居然一堆问题，手柄完全无响应甚至搞得我电脑死机，恼火的差评
最后还是关闭steam手柄设置，靠第三方虚拟手柄软件强行玩完了。
游戏内容本身还行，更像是个portal1.5，新加的几种元素很好玩，尤其纯测试关体验极佳。但是逃脱关的分段读取很烦，而且场景辨识度不高，中间有几段引导不明显，很容易晕

Мне очень понравилось, начал со второй части, но сюжет полностью понял. Очень много головоломок, дает вам понять всю историю Apeture: Science Inovations. История мрачная, но чертовски затягивает! Иногда даже боишься зайти в темный угол настолько атмосферная игра.
 Кооператив здесь не только ради галочки. Он здесь проработан, в основной истории есть даже отсылки на кооп. Перед прохождение второй части, не обязательно покупать первую, все, что вам нужно знать перед прохождением: Глаша убила всех людей. ты когда-то убила ГЛэДоС, но она как пьяный сосед Боря просыпается и готов всем давать пизды.

Awesome-and I love the fact that fans/players can actually make their own Test Chambers! Incredible- creators of Portal 1 and 2 are geniuses that cater to incredibly genius fans who created the most awesome chambers- except for the Unreal Chamber-gave me a headache and never solved it. Caretcaret was stupendous- and the last one where i woke up in a damp chamber without a portal gun- gave me the creeps- genuine scare hahahaha!

one of the best puzzle games i've ever played

Portal 2 is everything the first Portal was, cranked up to 50. The puzzles in this game can be quite challenging compared to its predecessor, but not to the point where they feel impossible. Absolutely everything in the second half of the game was simply brilliant, both in gameplay and in the story. Just like the first title, the writing is very humorous and sarcastic. I legitimately burst out laughing at certain parts. But what really puts this one ahead of Portal is the introduction of a new character, Wheatley, a lovable, bumbling, charming AI who's only purpose is to make mistakes, and I absolutely adore him. The voice actor for Wheatley deserves a lot of praise. His delivery is pitch perfect, and he is easily the best part of this game. Every scene where he and GLaDOS bicker with each other is precious, and more than worth the price of admission by itself. You are doing yourself a disservice by not experiencing this magic. People often label Portal 2 as one of their all-time favorites, and I happily count myself among them after just a single playthrough. I seriously cannot recommend this game highly enough. If everybody in the world played Portal 2, that would make me so incredibly GLaD.

At first, it would seem like a witty puzzle game. It sure is but it has more atmosphere to that. As the story being not that deep, valve does know how to deliver it masterfully. You don't need drama, deep characters, action or motivational scenes to tell a good story. You just need the correct atmosphere and valve showed us that. Jokes were always on point and puzzles were compelling. Great work.
